sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; function SectionCanDesiredProfile() { const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ Industry: '', Department: '', Role: '', Jobtype: '', EmploymentType: '', PreferredShift: '', AvailabilitytoJoin: '', ExpectedSalary: { MoneyType: "", Money: { lakh: '', thousand: '' }, }, DesiredLocation: '', DesiredIndustry: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; if (name.includes('.')) { const [parent, child] = name.split('.'); setFormData({ ...formData, [parent]: { ...formData[parent], [child]: value, }, }); } else { setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value, }); } }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { const response = await axios.post('http://localhost:8080/candidate/Career', formData, { withCredentials: true, // Ensure cookies are sent with the request }); setMessage(response.data.message); // Display success message } catch (error) { setMessage(error.response?.data?.message || 'Something went wrong'); } }; return (
{/* Heading */}

Desired Career Profile

{/* Career Profile Details */}
Industry
{formData.Industry || 'N/A'}
Functional Area
{formData.Department || 'N/A'}
Role
{formData.Role || 'N/A'}
Job Type
{formData.Jobtype || 'N/A'}
Employment Type
{formData.EmploymentType || 'N/A'}
Desired Shift
{formData.PreferredShift || 'N/A'}
Availability to Join
{formData.AvailabilitytoJoin || 'N/A'}
Expected Salary
{formData.ExpectedSalary.Money.lakh || 'N/A'} Lakhs
Desired Location
{formData.DesiredLocation || 'N/A'}
Desired Industry
{formData.DesiredIndustry || 'N/A'}
{/* Modal for Editing Career Profile */}

Edit Desired Career Profile

{/* Inputs for all the fields */}
{/* More fields for EmploymentType, PreferredShift, etc... */} {/* Submit Button */}
{message &&
{message}
}
); } export default SectionCanDesiredProfile;
